sent.orig: The dictionary authorizes the two spellings "honor" and "honour.".
sent.trans: 字典裁定 honor 及 honour 两种拼法均可。

sent.orig: This is our school of Austrian economists great compliment, and we honor this great honor.
sent.trans: 这是对我们奥地利学派经济学家的极大恭维，而且我们对此荣誉深感荣耀。

sent.orig: Ever attained honor of of province-level outstanding award, the prize, and of Culture issued honor certificates.
sent.trans: 曾获省优秀奖、三等奖、文化部颁发的荣誉证书。

sent.orig: The "h" in "honor" is not aspirated . honor.
Honor: Help people as much as I can, honor just a reward.
sent.trans: 荣誉：尽己所能帮助别人，荣誉只是一种回馈。
